title: generate_kundli_with_valid_input
description: Test the /api/kundli POST endpoint with valid birth date/time, latitude, and longitude to verify successful generation of a detailed Vedic Kundli chart including ascendant, planetary positions, houses, nakshatras, panchang, dasha, divisional charts, dosha, and optional matching metadata.

title: generate_kundli_with_missing_required_fields
description: Test the /api/kundli POST endpoint with missing required fields such as date, lat, or lon to verify that the API returns a 400 validation error.

title: calculate_compatibility_with_valid_moon_longitudes
description: Test the /api/match POST endpoint with valid boyMoonLong and girlMoonLong values to verify correct calculation of horoscope compatibility score and details based on Vedic astrology principles.

title: calculate_compatibility_with_missing_moon_longitudes
description: Test the /api/match POST endpoint with missing boyMoonLong or girlMoonLong to verify that the API returns a 400 error indicating missing moon longitudes.

title: calculate_panchang_with_valid_date_and_location
description: Test the /api/panchang POST endpoint with valid date, latitude, and longitude to verify correct computation of daily Panchang details such as tithi, nakshatra, and yoga.

title: calculate_panchang_with_missing_date_or_location
description: Test the /api/panchang POST endpoint with missing date or location fields to verify that the API returns a 400 validation error.

title: calculate_vimshottari_dasha_with_valid_input
description: Test the /api/dasha POST endpoint with valid moonLongitude and date to verify correct calculation of Vimshottari Dasha periods.

title: calculate_vimshottari_dasha_with_missing_fields
description: Test the /api/dasha POST endpoint with missing moonLongitude or date to verify that the API returns a 400 validation error.

title: get_daily_horoscope_with_valid_sign
description: Test the /api/horoscope POST endpoint with a valid zodiac sign to verify that the API returns the correct daily horoscope message.

title: get_daily_horoscope_with_missing_sign
description: Test the /api/horoscope POST endpoint with missing zodiac sign to verify that the API returns a 400 validation error.
